content: --मल {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {1} free from dirt or impurities, clear, pure, stainless, unsullied (<ab>fig.</ab> also); नीरान्निर्मलतो जनिः <ls>Bv. 1. 63.</ls> {2} resplendent, bright; <ls>Bh. 1. 56.</ls> {3} sinless, virtuous; <ls>Ms. 8. 318.</ls> (--लं {1} talc. {2} the remainings of an offering made to a deity.
